channel.title: [508] shop bug

item.title: [508] shop bug
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

i have a bug in mt shop system

if i want to look to the shop price my charater disconect from server
whats wrong?

my code:
itemoption1.java

[code]case 278:
if(itemId == p.shop2[itemSlot])
{
p.frames.sendMessage(p, Engine.items.getItemName(itemId)+" currently costs: “+p.shop2p[itemSlot]+” coins.");
}

{

}
break;[/code]

can anyone help me?
